name: gp-connect-user-permissions

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/gp-connect-user-permissions.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/gp-connect-user-permissions.json
